snippet.title: Cards and Towers - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Cards and Towers is a unique blend of card games, tower defense and roguelikes. Craft your own unique deck, protect your base tower, slay hordes of enemies, and survive as long as possible. Are you ready?

WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2464750/Cards_and_Towers/

Follow Family Devs:

► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/family_devs
► DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/DbtDSuxkHx
► TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@family_devs
► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/FamilyDevs

..................................................................................................................

About Family Devs:

Family Devs is an indie game development studio based in Barcelona, Spain. Family Devs develops and publishes indie games for all platforms. The company consists of a father and sons, all of whom are passionate gamers. For more information visit our website: https://familydevs.com/

#indiegame #indiegames #gaming
